entities.description: A mental health condition often characterized by persistent feelings of sadness or loss of interest in activities.
A notable decrease in weight without the intention to lose weight, often experienced when problems are at their worst.
Issues related to falling asleep, staying asleep, or waking up early, especially when problems are at their worst.
Sleeping a lot more than usual, observed during the most recent or worst period of problems.
Options provided to respondents for answering survey questions, including choices like Yes, No, Don't Know, Refused, etc.

relationships.description: Indicates weight loss without trying as a symptom of adolescent depression.
Indicates sleep problems as a symptom of adolescent depression.
Indicates excessive sleep as a symptom of adolescent depression.
Describes the answer choices provided to respondents in the survey.
